page.title: 11Government
page.content: Area is part of{Sevenoaks}Constituency returning 1 M.P. It is of the lowest tier of local government ie a Parish Council. P.C. has 9 members & Clerk, a part time paid appointee. Members are elected for 4yrs. It has no statutary powers but raises a parish rate & has the right to be consulted by D.C. on applications for consent to build. This local input is influential. Powers re foot path rights of way are delegated from County to District. P.C's are encouraged to take responsibility for them. The P.C. is looked to as an organ of local opinion to channel the needs of the parish to appropriate bodies. This Parish & Cowden elects 1 member to D.C. & with 5 other parishes 1 member to Kent County Council.
